experience: You and Saurav both know David Lenertz

- Lead and manage a team of talented recruiters,helping them in understanding the requirements in detail,have different approaches to positions and in turn motivate them to perform better.- Manage Application Tracking Systems like Zoho.- Sourcing relevant candidates from various job portals like Dice, Linkedin,Monster,CareerBuilder,Ladders for some of our leading US IT clients.- Worked for various US IT clients on a number of full-time Technical/Delivery/Sales positions like: Business Development Manager,Business Development Director,Client Partner,Account Manager across a number of verticals like Manufacturing,Oil & Gas,Automotive,Retail & CPG,Hi-Tech,besides others.- Delivery/Technical positions like Solution Head/Pre-Sales(Oracle Retail),Pre-Sales Consultant for Network Technologies and Solutions,Associate Director-Technical Architect,Senior Solution Mobility Architect,as well as positions like JAVA Developers & Architects,iOS and Android Developers & Architects,Front-End and Back-End developers,besides others.- Also act as the SPOC HR for the company's internal purposes,responsible for first-level screening of prospective employees,rolling-out of Offer Letters as well as Exit/Release Letters,manage the leave schedule,handle IR issues and also conduct exit-interviews.* Closed a number of very urgent and important requirements for various Tier-1 and Tier-2 IT Services Firms in USA.
